00006 #include <tbb/concurrent_hash_map.h>

00009 #include "util/hash_support.hh"
00010 
00011 template
00012 <
00013   typename Key,
00014   typename Data,
00015   typename HashKey = d3::util::hash<Key>,
00016   typename EqualKey = d3::util::equal<Key>
00017 >
00018 struct tbb_hash_map
00019 {
00020   struct hash_compare
00021   {    
00022     bool
00023     equal( const Key& k1, const Key& k2)
00024     {
00025       return EqualKey()(k1,k2);
00026     }
00027 
00028     size_t
00029     hash( const Key& k)
00030     {
00031       return HashKey()(k);
00032     }
00033 
00034   };
00035 
00036   // Types
00037   typedef tbb::mutex mutex;
00038   typedef tbb::concurrent_hash_map<Key,Data,hash_compare> internal_hash_map;
00039   typedef typename internal_hash_map::iterator iterator;
00040   typedef typename internal_hash_map::const_iterator const_iterator;
00041   typedef typename internal_hash_map::size_type size_type;
00042   typedef typename internal_hash_map::accessor accessor;
00043   typedef typename internal_hash_map::const_accessor const_accessor;
00044 
00045   // Attributes
00046   internal_hash_map map_;
00047   mutex map_mutex_;
00048 
00049   // Methods
00050   tbb_hash_map()
00051     :
00052     map_(),
00053     map_mutex_()
00054   {
00055   }
00056 
00057   iterator
00058   begin()
00059   {
00060     return map_.begin();
00061   }
00062 
00063   const_iterator
00064   begin() const
00065   {
00066     return map_.begin();
00067   }
00068   
00069   iterator
00070   end()
00071   {
00072     return map_.end();
00073   }
00074 
00075   const_iterator
00076   end() const
00077   {
00078     return map_.end();
00079   }
00080 
00081   size_type
00082   size() const
00083   {
00084     return map_.size();
00085   }
00086   
00087   bool
00088   empty() const
00089   {
00090     return map_.empty();
00091   }
00092 
00093   void
00094   clear()
00095   {
00096     // non reentrant method, need to lock the hash_map
00097     mutex::scoped_lock lock(map_mutex_);
00098     map_.clear();
00099   }
00100 
00101   bool
00102   find( const_accessor& result, const Key& key) const
00103   {
00104     return map_.find(result,key);
00105   }
00106 
00107   bool
00108   find( accessor& result, const Key& key)
00109   {
00110     return map_.find(result,key);
00111   }
00112 
00113   bool
00114   insert( const_accessor& result, const Key& key)
00115   {
00116     return map_.insert(result,key);
00117   }
00118 
00119   bool
00120   insert( accessor& result, const Key& key)
00121   {
00122     return map_.insert(result,key);
00123   }
00124 
00125   bool
00126   erase( const Key& key)

00129   }
